Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Reserved Water and Resource Conservation

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain property to the City of Show Low, Arizona.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in certain tracts of land known as David C. Porter Park and Show Low Municipal Airport to the city of Show Low, Arizona. Declares that title to such properties shall revert to the United States if the properties are used for other than public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain property to the City of Show Low, Arizona.
